content: Pick up the fiery blade, and you’ll learn a Transformation Spell: **Red Tides**. Now you’ll be able to transform into the very boss you defeated, and use his own abilities in combat against your enemies.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Guangzhi.md', within the main section titled 'Guangzhi', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Guangzhi' and the sub-subsection 'Guangzhi Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Pick up the fiery blade, and you’ll learn a Transformation Spell: **Red Tides**. Now you’ll be able to transform into the very boss you defeated, and use his own abilities in combat against your enemies.
